post:
Hi everyone, we were featured here on LowEndBox in December: https://lowendbox.com/blog/ssd-nodes-6-99-openvz-4gb-ram40gb-ssd4tb-bw-in-montreal-ovh/

I wanted to extend a great deal to LEB/LET readers. These servers are extremely fast and very powerful, they utilize RAID10 Intel S3700 SSDs along with the newest Intel E5 v3 processors. You get full root access for as little as $2.99/mo.

We accept PayPal, all major credit cards (through Stripe), and Bitcoin

**LowEndBox Large**

* 4GB RAM
* 40GB SSD
* 4x E5 v3 Cores
* 4TB BW
* 1x IPv4
* OpenVZ/SolusVM
* $6.99/m or $48/year
* [Order Here](https://www.ssdnodes.com/manage/cart.php?a=add&pid=108)


**LowEndBox Medium**

* 2GB RAM
* 20GB SSD
* 2x E5 v3 Cores
* 2TB BW
* 1x IPv4
* OpenVZ/SolusVM
* $4.99/m or $40/year
* [Order Here](https://www.ssdnodes.com/manage/cart.php?a=add&pid=107)


**LowEndBox Small**

* 1GB RAM
* 10GB SSD
* 1x E5 v3 Core
* 1TB BW
* 1x IPv4
* OpenVZ/SolusVM
* $2.99/m or $29/year
* [Order Here](https://www.ssdnodes.com/manage/cart.php?a=add&pid=106)


The Network:

* Datacenter located in Montreal, Canada.
* Test IPv4: 167.114.120.200
* Test file: http://167.114.120.200/test500.zip
